column4: News;(Preah Sihanouk):------ A Chinese man collapsed on a road in Sangkat 3
column6: and was transported by ambulance to a clinic. The victim died before reaching hospital. The incident happened at 02:00 AM
column12: was a carpenter working in Borei Keo Asia in Sangkat 3
column13: Sihanoukville.------The same authority stated that  the dead man was killed after sustaining to serious head injuries. How these head injures were sustained is not clear.------Currently
column14: the body is  in the provincial hospital waiting for the embassy to decide what action to take.------More images at ------Fresh News
